snippet: As the death toll mounts in Yemen, bloggers are sharing close-up views of the war in updates tagged with the Arabic word kefaya, meaning “enough.”
lead_paragraph: As the death toll mounts in Yemen, bloggers are sharing close-up views of the war in updates tagged with the Arabic word kefaya, meaning “enough.”

headline.print_headline: Tired of War, Yemeni Bloggers Say, ‘Enough’
headline.main: Tired of War, Yemeni Bloggers Say, ‘Enough’
